# uni-combo-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                          | Type            | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | --------------- | ----------- |
| `options` | --        | Available options in the combo group | `ComboOption[]` | `[]`        |
| `value`   | `value`   | ID of the selected option            | `string`        | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                              | Type               |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `uniChange` | Emitted when the selected option changes | `CustomEvent<any>` |
